i1.name: Leverage
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Renata's''' [[basic attack]]s apply a mark that lasts 6 seconds, which refreshes on subsequent hits and expires when attacking a new enemy. If the enemy was unmarked, this also deals {{as|{{pp|key=%|1 to 2 for 9}}|health}} {{as|(+ 2% per 100 AP)}} {{as|of the target's {{sti|'''maximum''' health}}}} {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}}.

Allied {{tip|champions|champions'}} damaging attacks and abilities against a marked target will consume the mark to deal {{as|{{pp|key=%|1 to 2 for 9}}|health}} {{as|(+ 2% per 100 AP)}} {{as|of the target's '''maximum''' health}} as {{as|additional '''bonus''' magic damage|magic damage}}.
i1.descriptionHtml:
Innate: Renata's basic attacks apply a mark that lasts 6 seconds, which refreshes on subsequent hits and expires when attacking a new enemy. If the enemy was unmarked, this also deals 1% − 2 for 9% (based on level) (+ 2% per 100 AP) of the target's maximum health bonus magic damage.
Allied champions' damaging attacks and abilities against a marked target will consume the mark to deal 1% − 2 for 9% (based on level) (+ 2% per 100 AP) of the target's maximum health as additional bonus magic damage.
Leverage's damage is capped at 150 against monsters.
i1.notes:
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will not block the mark's application.
** {{Pending for test}}: Interaction with mark consumption

q1.name: Handshake
description:
{{sbc|Active:}} '''Renata''' fires a hook in the target direction that deals {{as|magic damage}} to the first enemy hit and {{tip|root|roots}} them for 1 second, during which they are {{tip|true sight|revealed}}.

If the {{tip|root}} was applied, '''Renata''' forms a {{tip|tether}} between her and the target for the same duration, causing '''Renata''' to become unable to declare attacks and have her {{as|movement speed}} '''reduced''' by {{as|30%|ms}}.
''Handshake'' can be recast while the tether is active.

{{sbc|Recast:}} '''Renata''' breaks the tether to {{tip|airborne|knock}} the target in the target direction, though not through terrain, dealing the same damage to enemies they pass through. If the thrown target is a {{tip|champion}}, all secondary targets hit are {{tip|stun|stunned}} for {{fd|0.5}} seconds.
q1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Renata fires a hook in the target direction that deals magic damage to the first enemy hit and roots them for 1 second, during which they are revealed.

If the root was applied, Renata forms a tether between her and the target for the same duration, causing Renata to become unable to declare attacks and have her movement speed reduced by 30%.
Handshake can be recast while the tether is active.
Recast: Renata breaks the tether to knock the target in the target direction, though not through terrain, dealing the same damage to enemies they pass through. If the thrown target is a champion, all secondary targets hit are stunned for 0.5 seconds.
q1.notes:
* Applies {{tip|spell damage}} to the primary target and {{tip|area damage}} to secondary targets.
* ''Handshake's'' interaction between its tether and root:
** If the root is not applied, neither is the tether.
** The tether's duration lasts the same as the root duration, even if it is modified by {{tip|tenacity}}.
** If the root is removed, the tether is as well, but not vice versa.
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will block the hook but not the recast's effects as the primary target.
** As a secondary target, the recast's effects will be blocked.
* '''Renata''' may still move while the hook is in flight.
** Her facing direction is locked towards the target direction of the hook.
* While the target is hooked, '''Renata's''' facing direction is considered to be in their direction and not in the one she is moving.
* The {{stil|movement speed}} reduction stacks additively with other {{as|movement speed}} bonuses.
** It is a negative bonus, not a {{tip|slow}}, and is thus not reduced by {{tip|slow resist}}.
{{Effect at cast time start}}

w1.name: Bailout
description:
{{sbc|Active:}} '''Renata''' infuses herself or the target allied champion with a chemtech formula for 5 seconds, granting the target {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' attack speed}}}} in addition to {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}} while they are moving toward nearby {{tip|sight|visible}} enemy champions and minions, both increasing in effectiveness by 100% over the duration.
''Bailout's'' duration resets whenever the target scores a {{tip|takedown}} against an enemy champion within 6 seconds of damaging them.

If the target takes {{tip|death|fatal damage}} while ''Bailout'' is active, they are restored to {{as|100% of their '''maximum''' health}} but suffer a {{as|true damage}} burn equal to {{as|10% of their '''maximum''' health}} every {{rutngt|0.25}} until they die from reaching 0 health, during which ''Bailout's'' duration resets every {{fd|0.25}} seconds. This effect may occur only ''once'' per application of ''Bailout'' while not already active on the target.
During this time, if they score a {{tip|takedown}} against an enemy champion within 6 seconds of damaging them, the burn is stopped prematurely and they are set to {{as|20% of their '''maximum''' health}}.
w1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Renata infuses herself or the target allied champion with a chemtech formula for 5 seconds, granting the target bonus attack speed in addition to bonus movement speed while they are moving toward nearby visible enemy champions and minions, both increasing in effectiveness by 100% over the duration.
Bailout's duration resets whenever the target scores a takedown against an enemy champion within 6 seconds of damaging them.
If the target takes fatal damage while Bailout is active, they are restored to 100% of their maximum health but suffer a true damage burn equal to 10% of their maximum health every 0.264 until they die from reaching 0 health, during which Bailout's duration resets every 0.25 seconds. This effect may occur only once per application of Bailout while not already active on the target.
During this time, if they score a takedown against an enemy champion within 6 seconds of damaging them, the burn is stopped prematurely and they are set to 20% of their maximum health.
leveling:
{{st|Bonus Attack Speed|{{ap|10 to 30}}% {{as|(+ 1% per 100 AP)}}|Maximum Bonus Attack Speed|{{ap|10*2 to 30*2}}% {{as|(+ {{ap|1*2}}% per 100 AP)}}}}
{{st|Bonus Movement Speed|{{ap|10 to 20}}% {{as|(+ 1% per 100 AP)}}|Maximum Bonus Movement Speed|{{ap|10*2 to 20*2}}% {{as|(+ {{ap|1*2}}% per 100 AP)}}}}
w1.notes:
* Damage taken in excess of the fatal damage taken does not apply to the target's health after it was restored.
* The self-damage taken is considered {{tip|raw damage}} and is calculated based on the target's '''maximum''' health at the time of taking lethal damage.
* ''Bailout's'' bonuses will not reset in effectiveness if its duration is refreshed.
* ''Bailout'' takes priority over all {{tip|resurrection}} and {{tip|zombie state}} effects.
* ''Bailout'' will stop refreshing its duration while the target is burning after 250 seconds have elapsed.
* ''Bailout'' cannot be used on {{tip|clone|clones}} nor {{tip|zombie state|zombie state}} units.

effects.str:
• Bonus Attack Speed: % (+ 1% per 100 AP)
  • Maximum Bonus Attack Speed: % (+ % per 100 AP)
  • Bonus Movement Speed: % (+ 1% per 100 AP)
  • Maximum Bonus Movement Speed: % (+ % per 100 AP)

e1.name: Loyalty_Program
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Renata''' sends out chemtech rockets from either side of her that instantly strike targets around her. After {{rutngt|0.4}} they converge and travel to the target location as a single missile, striking targets along its path and exploding upon reaching the target location.
'''Renata''' and allies struck are granted a {{tip|shield}} for 3 seconds and enemies struck are dealt {{as|magic damage}} and {{tip|slow|slowed}} by 30% for 2 seconds.
''Loyalty Program will cast at max range if cast beyond that.''
e1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Renata sends out chemtech rockets from either side of her that instantly strike targets around her. After 0.42900000000000005 they converge and travel to the target location as a single missile, striking targets along its path and exploding upon reaching the target location.
Renata and allies struck are granted a shield for 3 seconds and enemies struck are dealt magic damage and slowed by 30% for 2 seconds.
Loyalty Program will cast at max range if cast beyond that.
leveling:
{{st|Magic Damage|{{ap|65 to 185}} {{as|(+ 55% AP)}}}}
{{st|Shield Strength|{{ap|50 to 110}} {{as|(+ 50% AP)}}}}
e1.notes:
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will block either the rockets while they are in-flight or their explosion.
{{Effect at cast time start}}

effects.str:
• Magic Damage: (+ 55% AP)
  • Shield Strength: (+ 50% AP)

r1.name: Hostile_Takeover
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Renata''' launches a cloud of potent chemicals that travels in the target direction, granting {{tip|sight}} of its surroundings. Enemy champions and minions hit become {{tip|berserk}} for a duration.

''Berserked'' units gain {{as|100% '''bonus''' attack speed}} and 25% increased [[size]]. Within their targeting radius, they prioritize attacking the closest unit by the following categories in descending order:
# Their allied champions 
# Allied non-champions
# Allied {{tip|wards}}
# Enemy units (including {{tip|monster|monsters}})
r1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Renata launches a cloud of potent chemicals that travels in the target direction, granting sight of its surroundings. Enemy champions and minions hit become berserk for a duration.
Berserked units gain 100% bonus attack speed and 25% increased size. Within their targeting radius, they prioritize attacking the closest unit by the following categories in descending order: # Their allied champions # Allied non-champions # Allied wards # Enemy units (including monsters)
r1.notes:
:''See [[Types of Crowd Control#Berserk]] for specific details on Berserk.''
{{Effect at cast time end}}
